title: SEC says meme coins are not securities
description: The Securities and Exchange Commission issued guidance on Thursday saying it does not view most meme coins, which are crypto tokens that originated from memes, as securities under United States federal law. As a result, the SEC says it does not believe people who purchase or hold meme coins are protected by federal securities law, […]© 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.
